title: Almond Weights
question_text: The quality control inspector at an almond packaging plant checks the packaging equipment by randomly selecting and weighing $25\text{ bags}$ each day.  The packaging equipment is calibrated to package bags with a mean weight of $12\text{ ounces}$ and a standard deviation of $0.25\text{ ounces}$ . What should be the mean and standard deviation for the sampling distribution of all the daily mean weights?
